title: (x) John adarasz Coppersmith - Bellevue, Zapf International {Mark S}
content: They've combined two typefaces. The caps are from [Bellevue](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123819/http:/www.identifont.com/show?FI) and the lowercase are from [Zapf International Medium Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/zapf-international/medium-italic/testdrive.html?s=ohn%a0adarasz%a0oppersmith&p=48).
author: Mark Simonson
